name: window-worker
description: Tiny and mostly spec-compliant WebWorker polyfill

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdirp dist && browserify -s WindowWorker -p bundle-collapser/plugin . > dist/window-worker.js && browserify -s WindowWorker -p bundle-collapser/plugin polyfill.js > dist/window-worker.polyfill.js && uglifyjs -mc < dist/window-worker.js > dist/window-worker.min.js && uglifyjs -mc < dist/window-worker.polyfill.js > dist/window-worker.polyfill.min.js
